Package com.kontakt.sdk.ble.connection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBeaconConnection.ConnectionListener
    Connection listener provides callback methods when working with Beacon is required.
    IBeaconConnection.ProgressiveWriteListener
    The interface Progressive write listener.
    IBeaconConnection.WriteBatchListener<T>
    WriteBatchListener provides callback methods notifying about writing parameters batch to Beacon device.
    IBeaconConnection.WriteListener
    WriteListener provides callbacks indicating whether Beacon characteristics manipulation ended successfully or failed.
    OnServiceBoundListener
    OnServiceBoundListener The listener indicating that Object implementing ServiceConnector interface (ServiceConnector) successfully connected to the corresponding service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractServiceConnector
    AbstractServiceConnector provides an abstraction to every Service.
    IBeaconConnection
    Beacon connection allows establishing connection with beacon by authorizing it with its password and changing beacon parameters.
    ServiceConnectionChain
    Service connection chain.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IBeaconCharacteristic
    IBeaconCharacteristic The Name enums depict specification given in kontakt.io Beacon specification - version 2.
    IBeaconConnection.State
    State enum describes all possible state that BeaconConnection may be in.
